Team Fortress 2 Soldier HUD

"INTRUDER ALERT, A RED SPY IS IN THE BASE"

Hey guys! 😎
This is another HUD-themed usersight I made as a homage to my earlier DOOM and ULTRAKILL HUD sights
the last few days was Halo, now it is Team Fortress 2 and the HUD of the TF2 Soldier in the game's Capture the flag gamemode.

Like with the Halo rocket launcher usersight, There's the option to install each of the 3 sight choices with the HUD as the bonus drawing or not. There's also 3 reticle types to help choose your preference.
Inside the .zip fi...
#anime #animegirls #wtdraw #sight #bleach
